selectedItem.title: Implement authentication module
selectedItem.description: Create a comprehensive user authentication system with login/logout functionality, password reset, and email verification. This should integrate with our existing user database and follow security best practices.

comments.author: John Doe
comments.text: I've started working on this. Planning to use JWT for token management.

comments.author: Jane Smith
comments.text: Make sure to implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks.

comments.author: Mike Johnson
comments.text: We should also consider adding 2FA support in the future.
